title: Blood Moon Splash Wallpapers!
body:
**(Reposting in the right spot!)**

Hey friends! 

I know a lot of you had asked about wallpaper size versions of the latest Blood Moon splashes, so here ya go! :) 

**Artists**:
Blood Moon Talon - Alex Flores
Blood Moon Diana - Chengwei Pan
Blood Moon Jhin - Esben Rasmussen
Blood Moon Twisted Fate - Viktor Titov

I absolutely love the splash arts, but I have to ask; why are there inconsistencies between in-game models and splash arts? I know there's quality and clarity issues, but there seems to be some differences. Diana's fur-shoulder thing is white in the splash art, but black in-game (last I checked). And Jhin's splash art has the shoulder on the wrong side. It's a little bit late to fix Jhin's splash art, but could Diana be more consistent?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/arKZWy3n-riot-what-is-with-these-splashes?comment=000300000000000000000000
Thanks for posting context! :)

A Rioter senpai noticed me!
http://i.imgur.com/qf4Ivzl.gif?noredirect
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

As a Jhin player who loves his blood moon splash art a lot, I really gotta say, damn that Diana splash art is FANTASTIC! I don't even own Diana, but I am probably going to use that splash as my wallpaper at some point. I'm going to show it off to friends and family who don't even play League.

The mask, the paper behind her, the necklace, the weapon... so many amazing aspects! And really, the mood it has is my kind of thing. Dark, a little mysterious and menacing, but not so scary or emotional that it puts you off. It leaves you wanting to know more about it, which sets my imagination to work, and I love that.
I'd be happy to pass the kind words along! :)
Please do! :D
Arent there tweaks on the PBE to Jhin's splash that make his right arm blue?
There are! I just posted the latest splash in the post! :) Thanks for the call out!

THANK YOU!

Also not that I want to sound like an ungrateful bitititititch, do you think it would be possible to make some wallpapers for mobile devices?

Sometimes you just can't crop them right. Maybe the artists can adjust things to fit stuff properly? IDK. Thanks tho.

Hi! It's not ungrateful! We don't have plans to make wallpapers for mobile devices. :c The assets are created for various spots in the client, which is why they can be a bit of an odd shape. I'm curious now, is there an example of a particular splash you can't crop properly?

http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/zfjKdE-P58M/maxresdefault.jpg

But I guess the image was never meant to be displayed in portrait style. Thanks for responding. :o

Ahh, gotcha. ;_; Yeah, they're created for landscape orientation, and the loading screen is cropped from there. We'll occasionally tweak the loading screen slice for something like a shared splash (removing the arm of another champion, etc). 

For a phone screen, I'd imagine you'd crop it something like this:

http://imgur.com/0REBiRw

The new client has centered splashes in champion select, not sure if that's something you'd be into, but it's another asset the client offers:

http://imgur.com/ELwxtwz
Oh wow that centered one looks really good. Thanks. <3
You're welcome. <3
